text: Drama Special Series () is a weekly program on KBS2 showing multiple episodes short dramas, with each story having a different cast, director, and writer. The format is based on Drama Special. ==Drama Special Series== ===Season 1=== {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Title ! Episodes ! Cast ! Writer ! Director !
